mapper.select: select distinct brc.bug_id as bugId, b.num as bugNum, b.title as bugTitle, b.status bugStatus, b.handle_user bugHandleUser, count(brc.id) bugCaseCount from bug_relation_case brc join bug b on brc.bug_id = b.id where brc.test_plan_id = #{id} group by brc.bug_id

select distinct tprb.bug_id as id, tprb.bug_num as num, tprb.bug_title as title, tprb.bug_status as status, tprb.bug_handle_user as handleUserName, tprb.bug_case_count as relationCaseCount from test_plan_report_bug tprb where tprb.test_plan_report_id = #{request.reportId}
